taskbody.prereq: You can add an attribute from the Domain Designer to a fragment or a module. The fragment or module must already be associated with a domain entity; see section .
taskbody.context: These steps explain how to add an association from the Domain Designer.

step.cmd: On the Domain outline view, click and hold the left mouse button on the associations that you want to add to the diagram.
Drag the selected associations to their desired location on the diagram.

strow.stentry: Default fragment of cardinality 'one' associated with the linked dataset.
Default fragment of cardinality 'many' associated with the linked dataset.

result.p: If a translation is defined on the association, a translated label is also added.
